Introduction.Overview: CodiusMonitor aims to be an all-in-one solution for monitoring and managing a well-being of your codius network servers.
Introduction.Implementation: CodiusMonitor provides it's toolset based on Web Interface<->API<->CodiusMonitor client infrastructure. Websocket connection is established between the codiusd servers and web interface with API acting is as a gateway. This allows a real-time communication between the user interface and codius servers. For the sake of transparency the source code of a client software is made public here: https://github.com/opahopa/cmonitorcli
Introduction.Functions(monitoring):
- Server status monitoring: Online, Service(systemctl services)
 - Services status monitoring (codius-related services such as: hyperd, moneyd, codiusd, nginx) 
 - Server usage monitoring
 - Codius usage monitoring 
 - Hyperd usage moniroting
Introduction.Functions(management):
- Systemctl services management (start/stop/restart)
 - Codiusd variables settings 
 - Netstat command
 - Pod upload test tool 
 - Hyperd pods management 
 - Codiusd fee setting
 - Fail2Ban installer/management
Introduction.Functions(statistics):
- Hyperd Pods Count(Monthly)
 - Estimated Income(Monthly) 
 - Systemctl services statistics(future versions)

Installation: To use this tool, it is neccessary to install a CodiusMonitor client application at your server. Detailed instructions can be found here: https://codiusmonitor.com/panel/client

Overview.Monitoring:
Shown at the server details panel.
  • Server status monitoring: Online, Service(systemctl services)
    Server status monitoring indicated the online status, services status and running contracts count. Alert sign is shown in case of issue with any of the systemctl services
  • Services status monitoring (codius-related services such as: hyperd, moneyd, codiusd, nginx)
    Services status indicate the real-time status of the hyperd, codiusd, nginx, moneyd services. In addition, user have the ability to view latest service logs. In case if there are any erros - tab 'error' or tab 'warning' will be automatically opened.
  • Server usage monitoring
    Indicates used memory
  • Codius usage monitoring
    Shows: active contracts number, codiusd service uptime, server uptime.
  • Hyperd usage moniroting
    Active pods count
Overview.Management:
• Systemd services management.
    Provide a tools for systemctl services (hyperd, moneyd, codiusd, nginx) management. Currently supports actions:
    start, stop, restart
    After the action button clicked, command status notification message is shown.
  • Codiusd variables editor
    Changes a codiusd variables in codiusd.service file and restarts the service. Variables not supported by the installed codiusd version are disabled. Variables changes usage migh significantly affect codiusd behavior - use on your own risk.
  • Netstat command
    executes
    netstat *args*
    command. Default arguments are `-tulnp`. Include `-` when providing custom arguments.
  • Pod upload test tool
    Installs codius cli and uploads a sample contract for 60 seconds duration. Outputs full log. Pod upload command:
    DEBUG=* codius upload --host https://*your hostname* --duration 60 -o -y
  • Hyperd pods management
    Shows the result of
    hyperctl list
    command and option to stop and remove pod/s. Pods are removed by executing
    hyperd stop *pod*
    and
    hyperd rm *pod*
    commands
  • Codius fee setting
    Changes codiusd.service fee variable
  • Server usage monitoring
    Indicates used memory
  • Fail2Ban installer / manager
    Installs fail2ban by executing https://github.com/opahopa/cmonitorcli/blob/master/services/scripts/install_fail2ban.sh bash script. Shows last unsuccessfull login attempts.
Overview.Statistics:
Shows summary for all your codius servers
  • Hyperd Pods Count
    Display the 'hyperctl list' pods count statistics
  • Income
    Display the estimated income based on the number of contracts and the server fee.
  • Services Activity
    Displays the service status over the time (active/inactive). "Filled" chart layout represents an active state.
